snippet.title: Monaco 2 Devlog #3: End of Preproduction
snippet.description:
Hope you enjoy a new vlog about the overall progress we made on gameplay, procgen, and much more.  Help us answer some of the questions that we’ve stumbled upon during the development! How do we encourage teamwork? What would be your ideas on how to make character abilities shine and align with heist tropes? Why haven’t you added Monaco 2 to your wishlist yet?
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1063030/Monaco_2

Did you know we have a discord channel? Join our community to be first to hear exciting news:
Discord: http://discord.gg/pocketwatch

We stream almost everyday! Take a sneak peak into development and join us on our Thursday’s playtests:
Twitch: http://twitch.tv/pocketwatch


0:00 Introduction
1:12 Work in progress
2:20 Gameplay
8:20 Procedural generation
14:02 Editor: behind the scenes
16:21 Hiding dudes in the boxes
16:38 Characters and abilities overview
17:16 Characters and abilities: The Mule
18:12 Characters and abilities: The Prowler
19:44 Characters and abilities: Ink
21:04 Characters and abilities: The Hand
22:31 Out of bounds
25:14 Player collaboration
26:26 Conclusion
